# Askus

> Askus GmbH is an AI consultancy based in Vaduz, Liechtenstein. Focus: operational sovereignty through AI strategy, engineering, and enablement.

## Pages

- [AI Consultancy](/consultancy/): AI strategy, integration, and governance from roadmap to deployment.
- [Engineering](/engineering/): High performance systems, security, and integration work.
- [AI Enablement](/enablement/): Training in AI-assisted workflows for engineers: patterns, tools, and review practices.
- [Site Advantages](/liechtenstein/): Data sovereignty, IP protection, and EEA market access.
- [Contact](/contact/): Primary contact via email.

## Quick answers

- Askus provides: AI consultancy, engineering, and AI enablement for production systems.
- Askus location: Vaduz, Liechtenstein.
- Operational sovereignty: owning and controlling production systems, including security, governance, and deployment.
